title: Is this download speed good enough?
body: My internet has been running slower recently, and I want to make sure these are good regular speeds for playing League. Thanks!

replies.body:
Download speed isn't directly related to what factors most impact your experience in-game. You mostly just need a stable connection with minimal [*Packet Loss*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Packet_loss) or changes in latency (ping).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
